text: pasuva viniscaya dinadi nam, ohu ovunva avaman kara “(oba, obage devivarunva) ma hata samanayan yayi (pavasa, visvasavantayin samaga) oba tarka karamin sitiya noveda? eva koheda?”yi vimasanu æta. e avasthavedi adhyapana gnanaya denu læbuvan “ada dina avamanayada, vipatada niyata vasayenma pratiksepa karamin siti ayatayi” yayi pavasannaha
